group_1.textLeft: Are you sure your eyes didn't deceive you?
I can't sense anything around here, much@less a Witch.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, me neither. I wonder what I saw@yesterday was then?

group_1.textLeft: Either way, shall we wrap it up?
We've more or less finished this patrol.

group_1.textRight: All right. We'll stop for today.
Thanks for coming along with me.

group_1.textLeft: It's really gotten late. My stomach is@growling.

group_1.textRight: Okay then! As a thank you for helping@me out...
I'll treat you to an extra large rice omelet!

group_1.textLeft: I want onion gratin soup to go with it!

group_1.textRight: [chara:300901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Hang on, you're naming your own thank you?!
Amazing! You really have no manners at all!

group_1.textLeft: Can you stop insulting me in the same breath@that you praise me?

group_1.textRight: Hey now―

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!

group_1.textRight: Whoa, is that a Witch?!

group_1.textLeft: It just swallowed us up in its Labyrinth@before we even noticed it?!
You were right!

group_1.textRight: I told you so!

group_1.textLeft: We don't have time to bicker inside a@Labyrinth!
Shall we?!

group_1.textRight: Yes!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall][surround:3010A02]Prepare yourself! Haaah!!!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall][se:4053_landing_throw2]Raaah!
Hmph! You thought you were a match for me?!
You've got guts! I should expect as much@from a Witch, I suppose!
But I won't let you get away with it!@[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall][surround:3010A02]Haaah...

group_1.textLeft: Hm?
Oooh! Yachiyo!
[chara:301000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! Yachiyo?! Like, Yachiyo Nanami?!

group_1.textRight: We meet again.

group_1.textLeft: Ngh!!!
(What are you doing here again?!)
(No, wait! Could this be a chance to redeem@myself?!)
Ho ho...oh ho ho ho! Aaah ha ha haaa!!!

group_1.textRight: Wh-what?!

group_1.textLeft: You get used to it. Just let her get it@out of her system.

group_1.textRight: Oh, um, okay?

group_1.textLeft: How marvelous! This Labyrinth can serve@as our battlefield!
And we can settle, once and for all, fair and@square, who deserves to hold the spotlight!

group_1.textRight: The spotlight?

group_1.textLeft: Ahhh, here she goes again.
